channel.title: Data Analysis on Brian Higgins Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Data Analysis on Brian Higgins Portfolio

item.title: Data Visualization: Analyzing Dublin Bike Ride Data and Weather Patterns
item.description: Outline: In this comprehensive project, Python data visualization techniques are applied to the vast and complex datasets of Dublin Bike ride data and Met Eireann weather data. The project’s core objective encompasses exploring and analyzing large datasets, harmonizing diverse datasets based on time series, and performing data cleaning using Jupyter Notebooks. Throughout the analysis, Edward Tufte’s principles for effective data presentation serve as a guide, ensuring honest data representation, optimizing the data-ink ratio by eliminating non-essential elements, and providing context for more meaningful insights.
